original: Her name was Emily, and she had always been known as the happiest, most good-natured person in our small town. With her radiant smile and infectious laugh, she could light up even the darkest of days. Emily seemed to possess an almost magical ability to lift the spirits of those around her. Her presence could transform a room of frowns into a symphony of beaming faces. But what most people didn't
